describe: Palau is an archipelago of over 500 islands, part of the Micronesia region in the western Pacific Ocean. Known for its rich marine biodiversity, pristine beaches, and vibrant coral reefs, Palau is a paradise for divers and nature enthusiasts.

cities.name: üèù Ngerulmud
cities.geographical_location: Located on the island of Babeldaob, Ngerulmud is the capital of Palau.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with high humidity and warm temperatures year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Taro, coconut milk dishes, and fresh seafood.

cities.name: üèù Koror
cities.geographical_location: Situated on Koror Island, it is the largest city and the commercial center of Palau.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with frequent rainfall and warm temperatures.
cities.famous_cuisine: Fruit bat soup, grilled fish, and tapioca.
